uk.ac.aber.guidedwalk.android

Class MapScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapActivity
      • uk.ac.aber.guidedwalk.android.MapScreen

  • public class MapScreen
extends MapActivity
    This class extends the MapActivity Class which provides the ability to dispaly an Android Map. This Class was heavily influenced by the following site: - http://www.javacodegeeks.com/2011/02/android-google-maps-tutorial.html
    Author:
    Karl Parry (kdp8)

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • setupSys

        public SpecialMapOverlay setupSys(java.lang.String walkid)
        This method is the setup method for the Map display. The method calls the loadXML readwalk method which returns the walk data. This walk data is then parsed and passed onto the SpecialMapOverlay Class.
        Parameters:
        walkid - the unique ID relating to the selected walk file.
        Returns:
        the SpecialMapOverlay contains an Itemized Overlay which can be drawn on top of the map display.
